Great Cornard Library

Manager: Heather Welch

Thomas Gainsborough School (formerly known as the Upper School), Head Lane, Great Cornard
CO10 0JU

Tel: 01473 351242
Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
Friends group: Friends of Great Cornard Community Library

Social media:

  • Facebook

Facilities

  • Free wifi available
  • Scanning, printing and photocopying facilities
  • Accessibility information

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Friday, 0930-1015

Craft activities and homework help: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1100-1400

Homework help for 8-12 year olds

Thursday, 1510-1610

Homework help for 8-12 year olds

Saturday, 1030-1200

Tot Rock: songs and action rhymes for toddlers (term time only)

Monday, 1015-1045

Top Time: events and activities for older people
